credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Arthur Wiesenberger
title: The Sayings of Confucius
description: Clear glass sculpture (-17a), reminiscent of an irregularly faceted block of rock crystal, engraved with a Confucian inscription in formal Chinese calligraphy. Square black wooden base (-17b); red leather-covered case (-17c); read leather-covered folder containing black and white photograph and information about the sculpture (-17d).
name: Sculpture
